milk_of_magnesium.cloud_height.name: Cloud Height
milk_of_magnesium.fog.name: Enable fog
milk_of_magnesium.fog.tooltip: Toggles off all fog in the overworld.
milk_of_magnesium.max_entity_distance.to: Hides and does not tick entities beyond this many blocks. Huge performance increase, especially around modded farms.
milk_of_magnesium.vertical_entity_distan: Hides and does not tick entities underneath this many blocks, improving performance above caves. This should ideally be set lower than the horizontal distance.
milk_of_magnesium.max_tile_distance.name: Max Tile Distance
milk_of_magnesium.max_tile_distance.tool: Hides block entities beyond this many blocks. Huge performance increase, especially around lots of modded machines.
milk_of_magnesium.vertical_tile_distance: Hides block entities underneath this many blocks, improving performance above caves (if you have your machines in caves, for some reason). This should ideally be set lower than the horizontal distance.
milk_of_magnesium.ture_darkness.name: True Darkness
milk_of_magnesium.ture_darkness.tooltip: Makes the rest of the world more realistically dark. Does not effect daytime or torch light.
milk_of_magnesium.ture_darkness_mode.too: Controls how dark is considered true darkness.
